nodes.text: The Nym's Stronghold medical center was a medical facility in Nym's Stronghold on the planet Lok at the time of the Galactic Civil War. Members of the Lok Revenants and visitors to the Stronghold would seek out this facility to have their injuries and illnesses treated.
The large building had three floors. A terrace on the second floor provided a view over the northern part of the stronghold, the Grendin River and the small starport.

This medical center is a building in Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. It is not part of any quest in the game. In the early years of the game, players of the medic and doctor professions could heal other players' wounds in these buildings. Just being inside such a building would also slowly heal the player's wounds over time.
